queryMap.query: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') DATETIME , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) YYYYMMDD , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS' ) TIME , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) YEAR , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM' ) MONTH , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD' ) DAY , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24' ) HOUR , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI' ) MINUTE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS' ) SECOND , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, NVL(?, 'YYYYMMDD')) CUSTOM FROM DUAL

SELECT /* common_code */ TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 FROM TBEA_GRP_CD TGC , TBEA_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD = ? --ORDER BY TSC.CD ORDER BY TSC.SORT_ODR, TSC.CD

SELECT /* sort_common_code */ TGC.GRP_CD -- 그룹코드 , TGC.GRP_NM -- 그룹명 , TSC.CD -- 코드 , TSC.CD_NM -- 코드명 , TSC.RMK -- 비고 FROM TBEA_GRP_CD TGC , TBEA_SPEC_CD TSC WHERE TGC.GRP_CD = TSC.GRP_CD AND TSC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TGC.GRP_CD = ? -- ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TSC.RMK),TSC.CD ORDER BY TSC.RMK,TSC.CD

SELECT TRDO.DAY_ORD || '일차' DAY_ORD , TR .RACE_NO || '경주' RACE_NO , TR .STRT_TIME FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO , TBEB_RACE TR WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = TR.STND_YEAR AND TRDO.MBR_CD = TR.MBR_CD AND TRDO.TMS = TR.TMS AND TRDO.DAY_ORD = TR.DAY_ORD AND TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? AND TRDO.RACE_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TR .STRT_TIME = ( SELECT MAX(STRT_TIME) FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND RACE_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND STRT_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MI') )
SELECT PERSONAL_DATA_MN, ? AS PERSONAL_MN_ID FROM TBEA_MN WHERE MN_ID = ?

SELECT PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK, USER_ID, concat(concat('[',PERSONAL_MN_IP),']') AS PERSONAL_MN_IP FROM ( SELECT SEQ_NO, PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK, USER_ID, PERSONAL_MN_IP FROM TBEA_PERSONAL_MN_AUTH_HIST WHERE PERSONAL_MN_ID = ? AND USER_ID = ? ORDER BY SEQ_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
